sentences.en: A single ampersand is displayed in the caption and no characters are underlined.
sentences.cn: 这样，在标题中显示单个“&”符，并且没有带下划线的字符。

sentences.en: An error occurred while initializing the auto caption string table.
sentences.cn: 初始化自动题注字符串表格时发生了错误.

sentences.en: Can you think up a caption that exactly covers the whole idea?
sentences.cn: 你能想出概括全部内容的标题 吗 ?

sentences.en: CAPTION line should be self explanatory ( that means title ).
sentences.cn: CAPTION行应该是自我解释 ( 也就是标题 ).

sentences.en: Caption property is a short description of the object .
sentences.cn: 标题属性是对象的简短说明。

sentences.en: Caption: Lion statues standing at the stairs of the Angkor Wat temple.
sentences.cn: 描述: 狮子雕在吴哥窟庙宇的台阶旁.

sentences.en: Displays a message box with specified text, caption, buttons, and icon.
sentences.cn: 显示具有指定文本 、 标题 、 按钮和图标的消息框.

sentences.en: He studied each photograph twice and read the caption intently.
sentences.cn: 他把每幅插图都看了两遍,又聚精会神地念了插图说明.

sentences.en: I didn't understand the drawing until I read the caption.
sentences.cn: 直到我看到这幅画的说明才弄懂其意思.

sentences.en: In any case their names were in the caption at the bottom.
sentences.cn: 反正下面的说明中有他们的名字.

sentences.en: In the balance sheet, organization costs appear under the other assets caption.
sentences.cn: 在资产负债表中, 开办费出现在其他资产项目下.

sentences.en: On the back of the photo is written the simple caption, "Mrs. Monroe".
sentences.cn: 照片背面只有简单的几个字——“梦露女士”。

sentences.en: Our test is almost identical, but instead of the OK button and our OK button caption change, we'll check for the Cancel action.
sentences.cn: 我们的测试几乎是相同的，但并没有确定按钮，我们确定按钮的标题的变化，我们将检查的取消行动。

sentences.en: Specifies if the caption of a Form is half the normal height.
sentences.cn: 指定窗体的标题是否为正常高度的一半.

sentences.en: The local paper featured me standing on a stepladder with a caption, "Wendy climbs the ladder to success."
sentences.cn: 当地的报纸刊登了一幅我站在活梯上的特写，下面写着：“温迪登上了成功之梯。”

sentences.en: There is a caption under the picture.
We have noted your letter of August 5 under the above caption.
sentences.cn: 我们注意到你方上述标题下的八月五日来信.

sentences.en: You just earned yourself a photo with a bold face caption.
sentences.cn: 你刚刚赢得了一张大头照外加粗体标题.

trans.tran_en: words printed above or below a picture in a book or newspaper or on a television screen to explain what the picture is showing

trans.tran_cn: 加上标题； 加上说明
